name: @shimaore/pgcouch
description: PostgreSQL with record semantics like CouchDB
author: St√©phane Alnet <stephane@shimaore.net>

scripts.build: tsc --strict --esModuleInterop --target ES2021 --moduleResolution Node --declaration true --sourceMap true --declarationMap true index.ts && mv index.js index.mjs && mv index.js.map index.mjs.map
scripts.pretest: tsc --strict --esModuleInterop --target ES2021 --moduleResolution Node test/test.ts && mv test/test.js test/test.mjs && sed -i -e "s|from '\.\.'|from '../index.mjs'|" test/test.mjs
